title: Emerald Cascade Jhumkas - Modern Kundan Karnaphool
materials: High-quality Kundan simulated diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish finish.
features: Modern Jhumka design featuring a floral motif at the top and cascading emerald drops below. Intricate Kundan setting around the emeralds and simulated diamonds. The design blends contemporary aesthetics with traditional South Indian jewelry elements. Features a secure post and push-back closure.
colors: Predominantly green (emeralds) and white (simulated diamonds) with a warm gold tone.
occasions: and festive occasions like Sankranthi or Diwali.
description: These emerald cascade Jhumkas offer a stunning blend of contemporary design and traditional craftsmanship. The vibrant emeralds and sparkling Kundan simulate a luxurious look without compromising on comfort. The intricate detailing and Hyderabadi polish add to the piece's overall elegance and durability. A true statement piece that reflects both modern style and South Indian heritage.
